metadata.title: CVE-2024-47663 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:staging: iio: frequency: ad9834: Validate frequency parameter valueIn ad9834_write_frequency() clk_get_rate() can return 0. In such casead9834_calc_freqreg() call will lead to division by zero. Checking'if (fout > (clk_freq / 2))' doesn't protect in case of 'fout' is 0.ad9834_write_frequency() is called from ad9834_write(), where fout istaken from text buffer, which can contain any value.Modify parameters checking.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47663` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-50-generic - 6.8.0-50.51
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-50-generic - 6.8.0-50.51
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-50-generic-64k - 6.8.0-50.51
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1020-aws - 6.8.0-1020.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1020-azure - 6.8.0-1020.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1019-gcp - 6.8.0-1019.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1015-gke - 6.8.0-1015.19
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1017-ibm - 6.8.0-1017.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-50-lowlatency - 6.8.0-50.51.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-50-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-50.51.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1017-oracle - 6.8.0-1017.18
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1017-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1017.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1018-oem - 6.8.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1016-raspi - 6.8.0-1016.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-2015-raspi-realtime - 6.8.0-2015.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.1-1013-realtime - 6.8.1-1013.14
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1016.23
No subscription required
